Vicki Ward (born 30 June 1969) is an Australian politician. She has been a Labor Party member of the Victorian Legislative Assembly since November 2014, representing the Legislative Assembly seat of Eltham. She has been Minister for Natural Disaster Recovery, Minister for Emergency Services, and Minister for Equality since December 2024.
From 1998 to 2014, she was an advisor and electorate officer to federal Labor MP Jenny Macklin.
